page.title: 06Education.Newport School.
page.content: I leave my house at 8.30 a.m.to walk to school.I walk along the side of the canal before turning right and heading for the foot bridge near the school.The foot bridge allows the school children to cross the busy dual carriage way safely. The school day begins with our teacher taking the register.This is followed by a school assembly.Afterwards we return to our classroom and begin to work at our maths.The timetable for each day is varied.Sometimes we go to one of the ponds to study the water life or we might write a story.We have a very large playing field next to the school which means we can play games such as football,rounders and cricket. We also use this field for our sports day,when we have flat,potato,sack, obstacle races to mention but a few. Joanne Price,Canal Side West,Newport.
